label: A3B9CD2_hP15_164_ad_ei_b_d-001
title: Ba$_{3}$SrTa$_{2}$O$_{9}$ Structure
comments: Despite its hexagonal unit cell, this is closely related to \href{current_web_home_dir/AB3C_cP5_221_a_c_b-001}{cubic perovskite, $E2_{1}$}, as can be seen by looking at the nearly perfect cubes formed by the strontium and tantalum atoms.
